title: Problem installing doccano using docker-compose
body:
### System information
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 10.0.18362 
- **Python version**: 

### Describe the problem
When I am trying to use doccano from the docker-compose instructions, the build just hangs and does not install. I have tried several times so I am also removing orphans from previous attempts

### Source code / logs
C:\Users\cs720ro\doccano>docker-compose down --remove-orphans
Removing orphan container "doccano_backend_1"
Removing orphan container "doccano_nginx_1"
Removing orphan container "doccano_frontend_1"
Removing doccano_postgres_1 ... done                                                                                    Removing network doccano_default

C:\Users\cs720ro\doccano> docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up
Creating network "doccano_default" with the default driver
Creating doccano_frontend_1 ... done                                                                                    Creating doccano_postgres_1 ... done                                                                                    Creating doccano_backend_1  ... done                                                                                    Creating doccano_nginx_1    ... done                                                                                    Attaching to doccano_frontend_1, doccano_postgres_1, doccano_backend_1, doccano_nginx_1
backend_1   | /usr/bin/env: ÔÇÿbash\rÔÇÖ: No such file or directory
postgres_1  | 2020-02-03 14:31:24.616 UTC [1] LOG:  starting PostgreSQL 12.0 on x86_64-pc-linux-musl, compiled by gcc (Alpine 8.3.0) 8.3.0, 64-bit
postgres_1  | 2020-02-03 14:31:24.616 UTC [1] LOG:  listening on IPv4 address "0.0.0.0", port 5432
postgres_1  | 2020-02-03 14:31:24.616 UTC [1] LOG:  listening on IPv6 address "::", port 5432
postgres_1  | 2020-02-03 14:31:24.635 UTC [1] LOG:  listening on Unix socket "/var/run/postgresql/.s.PGSQL.5432"
postgres_1  | 2020-02-03 14:31:24.688 UTC [19] LOG:  database system was shut down at 2020-02-03 14:29:30 UTC
postgres_1  | 2020-02-03 14:31:24.700 UTC [1] LOG:  database system is ready to accept connections
doccano_backend_1 exited with code 127
doccano_frontend_1 exited with code 0
nginx_1     | 2020/02/03 14:31:26 [emerg] 1#1: host not found in upstream "backend" in /etc/nginx/conf.d/nginx.conf:13
nginx_1     | nginx: [emerg] host not found in upstream "backend" in /etc/nginx/conf.d/nginx.conf:13
doccano_nginx_1 exited with code 1
